name: Around the Corner (Gewi Studios)
description:
As a kid everything can be scary at night. A coat draped over a chair, the wind hollowing outside, that odd shadow staring at you. Oh, that wasn't there before? It's probably just a trick of the light. Mom did remember to plug in the nightlight, right?

This game is pretty short, but I hope you enjoy my little night terror tale.

Happy Halloween!
